thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au | 2 of 412
thread.title: Erin Hale
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Erin Hale

author: Erin Hale
title: Erin Hale
text:
The whole process was very quick and easy and to top it all off, a store rep called me 2 days after I made the purchase to tell me that the item I bought had just been reduced so he was arranging for $25 to be sent back to my paypal account, the money showed up 2 days after that as well as my item.
It was so great to see a company go out of their way to be fair to their customers.
